ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe if you think those prices are bad, wait till 39....i spent 190pp on 10 spells...still lack the 4 bars that i need to use them tho....gonna try for em
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe if you think those prices are bad, wait till 39....i spent 190pp on 10
spells...still lack the 4 bars that i need to use them tho....gonna try for em
tonight (;

I.G wrote:

> From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
>
> go out and kill for it... soon you will be getting stuff like snakeskin
> (mask is very nice... still have it at lvl18 (need a better one now))
> selling off the extra. banded is cheap save some cash for it. and if you
> think that the spells for 9th is bad just wait for 19th!!!! 10pp each
> spell!!! *ack*
>
> I have 40pp now for that lvl and I am still trying to make more
>
> also I hate to say this but I rarly destroy anything including rusty shit...
> *sigh*
>
> Jaxim (the pack rat)

> >figure my lvl 9 spells will cost me near 25pp, and I still have my
> >newbie armor, and a rusty warhammer, nothing else...to get all leather
> >armor would cost me around 25-30pp...I'm currently lvl 7, and I have
> >10pp to my name. It's a start, yes, but no where near where it needs to
> >be.
> >Even after this, how did you get money for the more exp spells?
> >This money issue is driving me crazy.
